tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CarbonFootprintData (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   date DATE,
   location VARCHAR(255),
   carbon_emissions DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  emissions_total DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_emissions (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   location TEXT,
   emission_type TEXT,
   emission_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_sources (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   source_name TEXT,
   source_type TEXT,
   emission_factor FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE emission_reduction (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   method TEXT,
   reduction_amount FLOAT,
   cost FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_targets (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   target_name TEXT,
   target_value FLOAT,
   target_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE emissions_tracking (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   tracking_date DATE,
   location TEXT,
   emission_type TEXT,
   emission_value FLOAT
)
